script.Text: I'm sorry about this, but I must protect Alterone.
Surprised, {main_character_name}? Alterone has already surrendered! Put him in a prison cell! I'll decide how to best dispose of him in a day or two.
Kane, you promised that Alterone would not be involved in any of this!
Quiet, fool! Or I'll throw you in the cell with him! Take him away.
